resources.string: This simple app allows you to create a remote control for PC using a drag-and-drop editor.
How can I connect my mobile device to my PC?
1. Download the remote server application from the link below and install it on your PC.
2. Go to the setting page by pressing the top-right corner of the app\'s main page.
3. Press \'Remote server IP address\' and enter the IP shown on the remote server application.
4. Press one of the created remote control on the app\'s main page and start connection.
I can\'t connect my mobile device to the PC server even with IP entered
Make sure there is no typo for the IP address, your PC\'s firewall is disabled and your mobile device and PC are connected to the same Wi-Fi network.
Make sure your PC uses the American keyboard setting.
